Document.TEXT: Colour: Red Body Style: Hatchback Description: Insurance Group 24, Franchise Approved, Driver & Passenger Air Bags, ABS Electronically Controlled With Brake Assist System,15 inch 5- Spoke Alloy Wheels With Locking Wheelnuts,Air Conditioning & Air Recirculation Function Manual,Ipod Preparation,Passenger Airbag Cut Off Switch,Bluetooth,Power Assisted Steering - Speed Sensitive Electric Control,Central Double Locking With Remote Activation,Green Tinted Glass,Driver Knee Airbags,Side Curtain Airbags,Front Side Airbags,Child Seat Fixings - ISO-FIX Outer Rear Seats,Transponder Key Engine Immobiliser,Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirrors,AM / FM Radio With Preset Settings,Electric Windows,Black Front Grille With Smoked Chrome Garnish & Boot Trim,Mirrors And Door Handles Colour Keyed,Front And Rear Colour Keyed Bumpers,Front Fog Lights,Ad Steering Column/Wheel - Tilt And Telescopic Adjustment,Rear Wiper Intermittent Sweep,60/40 Split Fold Rear Seat Back,Toyota Touch Audio System Inc.
